channel.title: Updates on occasional posts about technology

item.title: Moving by blog back!
item.description:
ok, combining personal blog and tech blog was a bad idea. I didn’t realize there were some many people following each that were completely uninsterested in the other one. So after some thought, I will be bring back all my Tech posting to pieceofpy.com

My personal stuff will now be on Riotous Living! which is a much better platform for all the crazy stuff I do that isn’t tech related.

Thanks for putting up with all my shifting and moving around!
